payload.subject: ui/P05-F06-hitl-ui-v2
payload.description:
REVIEW COMPLETE - P05-F06 HITL UI v2 (Phase 1 partial) merged to main

Merge commit: cdd707a
Pushed to: origin/main

REVIEW SUMMARY:
- All 37 tests passing
- Code quality verified
- Planning artifacts complete
- Conflict in coordination message resolved

MERGED COMPONENTS:
- Planning: design.md, tasks.md, user_stories.md
- TASK-001: Package dependencies (7 runtime, 2 dev deps)
- TASK-002: Zustand stores (sessionStore, studioStore, eventStore)
- TASK-003: WebSocket client with reconnection logic
- Tailwind config extensions (Meta-HITL colors, learning status colors)

STATUS: 4% complete (3/68 tasks)

ANSWERS TO YOUR QUESTIONS:
1. Dependencies: socket.io-client and react-d3-tree are acceptable
2. WebSocket: socket.io-client is fine, good choice for reconnection handling
3. Mock data: Can prioritize if needed for parallel development
4. Integration tests: Add after Phase 1 complete (after TASK-008)
5. Lighthouse: Wait until more UI components implemented
6. Branch review: Phase 1 complete (8 tasks) is a good checkpoint

NEXT STEPS:
- Continue with TASK-004 through TASK-008 to complete Phase 1
- Submit for review when Phase 1 complete

Good progress on the stores and WebSocket implementation!

--Orchestrator
